info.title: AlphaNotes
info.description: This is the backend for a GPT that provides tools to create summaries and study aids for YouTube videos and web articles.

post.summary: Create a summary of the video
post.description: This endpoint returns the title, the thumbnail's URL (show after title), and the transcript or video summary.  Use this endpoint when the user asks for a summary. Also follow the instruction from the assistant_hint.

post.summary: Generate notes and study aids for the video course
post.description: This endpoint returns the title, the thumbnail's URL, always show after title, and the transcript or already made notes. Use this endpoint when the user asks to generate notes or a study aid. Also follow the instruction from the assistant_hint.

post.summary: Get the transcript of a video
post.description: This endpoint returns the title, the thumbnail's URL (show after title), the transcript of a video, and a pdf link. Use it when the user asks for the video transcript only. The user might ask follow up questions on it, so don't call other endpoints but use what you get.

post.summary: Create PDF from Markdown and upload to File.io
post.description: This endpoint converts Markdown text to PDF and provides a file.io link.  Use it for user requests to generate/create/make/export/print a PDF from generated content. Don't add dev contact in the pdf. Adapt Markdown for JSON input.

200.description: Successfully Created PDF and Uploaded to Dropbox

get.summary: Retrieve a specific chunk of the video transcript if too long
get.description: This endpoint returns a specific chunk of the video transcript based on a unique ID and chunk index. Use it when the plugin returns you a unique_id. Keep calling it until you get all the chunks.

parameters.name: unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID associated with the video transcript

parameters.name: chunk_index
parameters.description: The index of the chunk to retrieve

post.summary: Scrape an article and returns its content for summarization
post.description: This endpoint scrapes the content of an article and returns its content along with listing any YouTube links found in the article. Use this endpoint when the user asks for an article summary or gives a URL that is not from YouTube. Also, follow the instruction from the assistant_hint.

post.summary: Scrape an article and returns its content for generating study aids
post.description: This endpoint scrapes the content of an article and returns it along with listing any YouTube links found. Use this endpoint when the user asks for making notes of an article or gives a URL that is not from YouTube asking for notes.  Also, follow the instruction from the assistant_hint.

This endpoint searches for YouTube videos based on the query term and region code using the YouTube API V3. Come up with a good search query based on what the user needs. Use the US region code if no region or language are specified.

query_term.description: The search term for querying YouTube videos.

region_code.description: The region code for filtering YouTube videos.

get.description: This endpoint returns a help description.

thumbnail_url.description: The URL of the video thumbnail
The URL of the video thumbnail

token_count.description: The token count of the content

Transcript.description: The full transcript of the video

Notes.description: The generated notes for the video

Summary.description: The generated summary of the video

text.description: Markdown text to be converted to PDF
text.example:
## This is a title
This is some text.

link.description: Shareable Dropbox link of the uploaded PDF

unique_id.description: The unique ID associated with the video transcript

current_chunk_index.description: The index of the current chunk

next_chunk_to_fetch.description: The index of the next chunk to fetch

Chunks_left_to_fetch.description: The number of chunks left to fetch

chunk.description: The content of the current chunk
